items.sentence: Tom was probably about thirteen at the time.
Tom was convinced he didn't need to do that.
Tom told me he was allergic to strawberries.
Tom told Mary that he wanted to leave early.
Tom thought that he wasn't going to survive.
Tom said that he got these tickets for free.
Tom said he didn't want to do anything else.
Tom may spend the night here if he wants to.
Tom knows that Mary wants to stay in Boston.
Tom is convinced that Mary wants to do that.
Tom is convinced that Mary ought to do that.
Tom is convinced that Mary needs to do that.
Tom is convinced he doesn't need to do that.
Tom is convinced he doesn't have to do that.
Tom has suggested that we do something else.
Tom has decided that he's not going to wait.
Tom has decided that he isn't going to wait.
Tom didn't know that Mary was only thirteen.
Tom didn't know somebody wanted to kill him.
Tom didn't know Mary wanted him to help her.
